content.title: Adding Delete Feature
content.body:
1. In the Action Editor window, from the left pane of the mapping editor, expand Forms > frmDetails > Label-lblRecipientIDValue, and select text{string}.
  2. From the right pane of the mapping editor, expand Services > RecipientStorage$Recipients$delete, and select RecipientID{number}.
    An alert appears. Click OK.
  3. From the top-right of the Action Editor window, select the Design View.
